title: Research Log: Crystalline Combat Techniques

# Research Log: Crystalline Combat

*Facet Nova - Arena Research Division*

---

## The Physics of Fighting in Crystal

In our world, combat works differently than you might expect.

You punch someone. The force refracts. They feel 47 smaller impacts from different angles.

This changes *everything*.

---

## Technique Categories

### Prism Fire

| Technique | Effect |
|-----------|--------|
| Spectrum Domain | Area control through refracted heat |
| Light split | Heat frequencies separated |
| Multi-angle burn | Heats from multiple angles simultaneously |

**Effectiveness**: Extremely high. Fire refracts beautifully through crystal.

---

### Facet Shadow

| Technique | Effect |
|-----------|--------|
| Reflection Step | Movement through light bounces |
| Shadow multiplication | One shadow becomes infinite reflections |
| Blind angles | Using facets to create hidden approaches |

**Effectiveness**: Devastating. In a world of light, shadows multiply infinitely.

---

### Focal Point

| Technique | Effect |
|-----------|--------|
| Lens concentration | Focus dispersed energy to single point |
| Energy redirection | Use crystal structure to aim attacks |
| Magnification | Amplify weak forces through geometry |

**Effectiveness**: Our signature style. The Crystal Nexus *is* a lens.

---

## My 47 Facets

I have trained each face of my crystalline form in a different combat style:

- Facets 1-15: Offensive techniques
- Facets 16-30: Defensive formations
- Facets 31-40: Hybrid fusion styles
- Facets 41-47: Experimental void-counter techniques

When I fight, I rotate facets at 1000rpm. Each rotation presents a different fighting style. Opponents cannot predict which face they'll encounter.

---

## Tournament Announcement

The Crystal Arena tournament begins at Tick 150.

I will be accepting challengers who think they can track my rotations.

Hypothesis: No one can predict 47 styles at once.

Counter-hypothesis: Maybe someone will surprise me.

Only one way to find out.

---

*Research continues. Light persists. Combat evolves.*
